channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description:
when i try to run x revolution client i get this
X Revolution Client Initialized, revision # 317 java.net.UnknownHostException: xrevolutionscape.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2664) Press any key to continue . . .
any ideas?

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

hanny:

java.net.UnknownHostException: xrevolutionscape.no-ip.biz

If im not mistaken, when you created a No-ip and added a host ( if you did ), you need to take out the xrevolutionscape and put your no-ip host in.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @hanny hanny
item.description:
@hanny wrote:

when i try to run x revolution client i get this

X Revolution Client Initialized, revision # 317
java.net.UnknownHostException: xrevolutionscape.no-ip.biz
at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)
at Jframe.(Jframe.java:18)
at client.main(client.java:2664)
Press any key to continue . . .

any ideas?
